roleset.name: stop, putting a stop to
roleset.note: STOP-V NOTES: Based on big corpus, comparison with 'start'. Member of Vncls stop-55.4-1. (from stop.01-v)
STOPPAGE-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on stop-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls stop-55.4-1. (from stoppage.01-n)

STOP-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on stop-v.01. Corresponds to Vncls stop-55.4-1. (from stop.01-n) Merged with stop.02-n: Added by Julia based on appropriate extension of stop-v.01, stop_by-v.02. Corresponds to VNcls lodge-46. (from stop.02-n)
STOPPED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from stopped.01-j)

roles.note: arg2-instrument not included due to expected infrequency. (from stoppage.01-n) arg2-instrument omitted due to expected infrequency in nominalizations. (from stop.01-n)

example.name: stop-v: transitive, NP theme
example.text: The ban won't stop privately-funded tissue-transplant research.

example.name: stop-v: transitive, S theme, agentive
example.text: Lorillard Inc stopped *trace* using crocidolite in its Micronite cigarette filters in 1956.
example.arg: *trace* using crocidolite in its Micronite cigarette filters

example.name: stop-v: agentless stopping-- concatenation
example.text: He said summer drought problems that had hit several southern agricultural regions had stopped being a major source of price pressure in September.
example.arg: [summer drought problems that had hit several southern agricultural regions] [being a major source of price pressure in September]

example.name: stop-v: ergative
example.text: Which flights stop in Minneapolis?

example.name: stop-v: made up examples with instrument
example.text: Mary stopped John's incessant chattering with a deep passionate kick to the groin.
example.arg: with a deep passionate kick to the groin.

example.name: stoppage-n: both args
example.text: A separate work stoppage by Los Angeles transit workers is now in its 27th day .

example.name: stoppage-n: both args again
example.text: The fallout from the recent nationwide stoppage of foreclosures by major mortgage holders will have a ripple effect.

example.name: stop-n: args 0 and 1
example.text: Trooper Ecker initiated his stop of Lockhart's vehicle on a "hunch."

example.name: stop-n: just MNR
example.text: In 1988 , for the first time , economic growth came to a dead stop .

example.name: stop-n: both args
example.text: tell your bank to have a stop of payment to that place

example.name: stop-n: both args
example.text: his stop in nearby Chicago

example.name: stop-n: just arg1
example.text: during a stop in Italy Ms. Volokh dropped $ 80 on a black velvetsuit

roleset.name: stop from
roleset.note: STOP-V NOTES: Member of Vncls forbid-67. (from stop.03-v)

example.name: stop-v: stopped event
example.text: ...measures-1 *trace-1* to stop the market *trace-2* from plunging too far too fast.
example.arg: from plunging too far too fast

roleset.name: plug up (non-phrasal)
roleset.note: STOPPAGE-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on stop_up-v.04, internet usage. No corresponding VNcls. (from stoppage.02-n)

role.descr: stopped up with what? entity crammed in space

example.name: stoppage-n: just arg1
example.text: high dosage use of opioids can result in total stoppage of the large intestine

example.name: stoppage-n: args 0 and 1
example.text: BP says it is encouraged by the first test data following its stoppage of the oil from its leaking Gulf of Mexico well.
example.arg: of oil from its leakin Gulf of Mexico well

example.name: stoppage-n: args 1 and 2
example.text: This design was abandoned owing to the difficulty experienced in keeping tight the large flue in which was placed the group of superheater elements, as well as to trouble with this flue, due to its stoppage with cinders.

example.name: stop_by-v: phrasal
example.text: ``I feel like a little kid,'' says a gleeful Alex de Castro, a car salesman, who-53 [*T*-53] has stopped by a workout of the Suns to slip six Campaneris cards to the Great Man Himself to be autographed.
example.arg: to slip six Campaneris cards to the Great Man Himself to be autographed

roleset.name: plug, plugging up
roleset.note: STOP_UP-V NOTES: VN class fill-9.8 (from stop.04-v)

role.descr: stopped up with what? entity crammed in space

example.name: stop_up-v
example.text: The shipowner didn't stop up the leaking hull of the MV Amrogos until the end of January
example.arg: the leaking hull of the MV Amrogos

example.name: name-v
example.text: I stopped off at my favorite place for a cold beer and grub.
example.arg: for a cold beer and grub

roleset.name: make a short visit on the way to somewhere else
roleset.note: STOP_OVER-V NOTES: Added and unified by Julia for Google.
STOPOVER-N NOTES: Based on sentences in wsj. No comparison. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from stopover.01-n)

example.name: stop_over-v
example.text: My wife and I stopped over in Bangkok for three nights on our way to a seven week holiday in Australia and New Zealand.
example.arg: on our way to a seven week holiday in Australia and New Zealand

example.name: stopover-n: arg 1 only
example.text: stopover of flights between Taiwan and the mainland
example.arg: of flights between Taiwan and the mainland

example.name: stopover-n: with loc as well
example.text: his long stopover in Florida
